name: Drop Hunt - Adventure Puzzle
description: Be prepared for next impossible challenge in the adventure of “Drop Hunt”.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 190 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 190 MB available space
